input.sentences: the coach took a moment with his team to talk strategy .
as they lined up for the game | they knelt on the ground .
there was an altercation that left a team member on the ground .
a whirlwind of orange socks was all the audience could see .
the white team had the ball and fought to keep it .
output.sentences: The team huddled to talk over their strategy for the next play.
When play resumed they lined up knelt on the ground.
Most of the team left the line while a few fell to the ground.
There was a whirlwind of orange socks suffocating the player on the ground.
The team fought for the ball and ran in for the score.
